title: Find Out What’s Next in New York
seo_title: Find Out What’s Next in New York
seo_description: What’s next? What’s the next technology to erupt onto the scene and sweep through every sector of the economy?
short_description: What’s next? What’s the next technology to erupt onto the scene and sweep through every sector of the economy? Who’s next? Which of today’s startups will be tomorrow’s Facebook, Uber, Google, or Amazon?
more_content:
What’s next? What’s the next technology to erupt onto the scene and sweep through every sector of the economy?

Who’s next? Which of today’s startups will be tomorrow’s Facebook, Uber, Google, or Amazon?

Those are literally million-dollar questions with billion-dollar answers. Sadly, we can’t answer them for you. But we can point you in the right direction.

Because no city is more abuzz trying to find answers to those questions than New York City. And if it’s you with the next big idea; if it’s you looking to be next? Then there’s no better place to be.

Internet Week New York

Celebrate all the ways technology positively impacts business and culture. Get to the IWNY festival from May 18 - 24 and mingle with business professionals from across all sectors. Since 2008, Internet Week New York has grown from a few events to a full week jam-packed with 45,000 attendees at events across the city. The event focuses on New York City’s unparalleled digital community and consists of more than 250 events taking place at the festival’s headquarters and over 150 events taking place at partner locations.

TECHSPO New York 2017

TECHSPO New York is where the worlds of business, tech, and innovation collide. This free, two-day exhibition brings thousands to the luxurious Marriott Marquis in Times Square — just down the street from The Iroquois — to witness the next generation of technology, including contextual tech, AR, VR, IoT, wearables, 3D-print, and emerging technology. TECHSPO New York 2017 happens May 8 - 9.

Startup Job Fair

New York City’s startup community is thriving … and hiring. And that’s why the Startup Job Fair exists; to connect the best startups from NYC and across the country with talented job seekers. The job fair has grown since 2009 to become a premier, nationwide platform for startups to hire exceptional talent. The next Startup Job Fair is taking place May 2, 12:00 p.m at Vanderbilt Hall, just a short drive south of The Iroquois.
